# Apprenticeship Registration - Apprentice Portal

Views: 

Apprentices can initiate their apprenticeship registration via the Online Registration in the SkilledTradesBC portal.

Navigate to the Online Registration section in the SkilledTradesBC portal.   
  
Click + Online Registration. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-apprentice_initiated_1.jpg)

Enter the Trade and Program you would like to pursue.   
  
You must have your sponsor’s organization ID.   
  
**DO NOT** include the “0” in front as it does not bring up the organization.   
  
Select Yes or No for Out of Province experience. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-apprentice_initiated_2.jpg)

Review and complete the Apprentice Attestation.   
  
Click Submit. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-apprentice_initiated_3.jpg)

Upon submission, the registration appears under the Active Online Registrations.   
  
The registration request is sent to the sponsor for review. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-apprentice_initiated_4.jpg)

Upon sponsor review, some registrations may need SkilledTradesBC review.   
  
The status reason changes to Pending SkilledTradesBC Review. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-apprentice_initiated_5.jpg)

After SkilledTradesBC has reviewed and approved the registration request, you can view it under the Processed Online Registration section. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-apprentice_initiated_6.jpg)

Keywords: Apprentice, registration

__
